front.title: Requirements for Internet-Draft Tracking by the IETF Community in the Datatracker

abstract.t: The document gives a set of requirements for extending the IETF Datatracker to give individual IETF community members, including the IETF leadership, easy methods for tracking the progress of the Internet-Drafts and RFCs of interest to them. This document is not an Internet Standards Track specification; it is published for informational purposes.
